title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Roles and Employment Trends of Instructional Design and Technology (IDT) Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in organizational education management
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Explain the 9 core job roles of IDT professionals through case-based examples
Compare IDT job competency requirements (technical/analytical/human skills) across higher education and corporate sectors
Analyze degree/tenure/salary patterns in IDT job postings and interpret them according to organizational characteristics
Propose mobile-friendly instructional design strategies implementable in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
